title-part.text: BURNERS

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

Group F23D11/443 is impacted by reclassification into group F23D11/445.
Groups F23D11/443 and F23D11/445 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group F23D14/12 is impacted by reclassification into groups F23D14/126, F23D14/147, F23D14/148, F23D14/149 and F23D14/151.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.
